name: Twomb i
description:
'Twomb i' is an interactive audio-visual study.

5 Cubes, 8 symbols & a myriad of ways to create your own musical arrangements.

A very short experience, in F#m.

Mouse - click on interactions and rotate the cube

Click on a Cube's symbol panel to open the arrangement UI.

Select a solution circle and then select the symbol you want placed inside. When all symbols have been used, you can play your arrangement.
